skills.name: SIPHONING FLAME
desc: • Deals random damage to all enemies.
• Heal up to 3 random allies based on your MAX HP.
• 65% Chance to Increase MAGIC of all allies for 2 turns.
• 65% Chance to Increase MR of all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: SOUL EXTRACTION
desc: • Deals high random damage to a single target.
• Grant MR Charge to all allies for 2 turns.
• Remove Endure and Ghost effects on the target.
• If the target is killed, Revive a random ally with full health and instantly gain an Extra Turn.

skills.name: LIFE AFTER DEATH
desc: Instantly Revive Self with 60% HP upon death.
